description: Whether to run Flask in debug mode. This exposes the
app to arbitrary code execution, so make sure this is
set to 'false' in production. When 'true', the development
server will automatically reload for code changes and show
a debugger when an exceptions happens.
The hostname to listen on. '127.0.0.1' (localhost) is
most common and makes the webapp available to the own
machine. '0.0.0.0' tells the OS to listen on all
public IPs and makes the webapp publicly available.
